portfolioPage.title: Portfolio Overview
portfolioPage.totalAvailableBalance: Total available balance. Note: Pending transactions reduce the available balance for currencies that are blocked for sale!
portfolioPage.profitInPercent: Total profit/loss in % for the entire period since the account was opened
portfolioPage.totalFeesTooltip: Total fees paid to the exchange for all trades since the account was opened, converted to the selected currency
portfolioPage.totalFeesTooltipAdmin: Total fees for all users ever paid to the exchange, converted to the selected currency
